This website was created in tandem with the article submitted to the _Journal of Aerosol Science_ entitled "Tutorial: Guidelines for Implementing Low-Cost Sensor Networks for Aerosol Monitoring". You can read the full article here: (https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jaerosci.2021.105872)

# Github

You can download the R Markdown file directly at the top of the "Tutorial" page. If you'd also like to see all source code that went into this website, you can [access it on GitHub here](https://github.com/nzimmerman-ubc/lcs-PM-demo).
